SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: Get Role List XML
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GETROLELISTXML ( @ROLELIST xml = null output ) as begin SELECT @ROLELIST = (SELECT ID, NAME as ROLENAME, CAST(0 as bit) SELECTED, CAST(null as uniqueidentifier) as SITE FROM ( SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ID, NAME FROM dbo.SYSTEMROLE WHERE NAME IS NOT NULL AND NAME <> '' AND ISSYSTEM = 0 ORDER BY NAME ASC ) sdf ORDER BY NAME ASC FOR XML PATH('Item'), Root('ROLELIST') ) end
